text: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo na kho mayaṃ āvuso cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya nti
edit: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo na kho mayaṃ āvuso cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya nti

translations.transtext: then the bhikkhunī is to tell the messenger: "We do not accept robe funds, my friend. We accept robes (robe-cloth) as are proper according to season."
